# Wall Bounce

Jump back and forth on the walls - when you're hitting one, you should be allowed to jump away.
To add some distance between walls, press **B**.

**Feature tested**: Bounds check fix for upper corner tile collisions from [pxt-common-packages#891](https://github.com/microsoft/pxt-common-packages/pull/891).

```sim
enum ActionKind {
    Walking,
    Idle,
    Jumping
}
/**
 * Have not added the anti-slide for example purposes.
 *
 * There is a wall jump if you jump again while pressing against wall.  Since the collisions are weird on left, it only works occasionally on the left side.
 */
// WALL JUMP
controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    if (mySprite.isHittingTile(CollisionDirection.Bottom)) {
        mySprite.vy = -200
    } else if (mySprite.isHittingTile(CollisionDirection.Left)) {
        mySprite.vx = 150
        mySprite.vy = -150
    } else if (mySprite.isHittingTile(CollisionDirection.Right)) {
        mySprite.vx = -150
        mySprite.vy = -150
    }
})
function doAnimation () {
    walking = animation.createAnimation(ActionKind.Walking, 100)
    idle = animation.createAnimation(ActionKind.Idle, 200)
    idle.addAnimationFrame(img`
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
    `)
    walking.addAnimationFrame(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . . . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . . . .
        . . . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . . . .
        . . . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . . . .
        . . . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . . . .
        . . . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . . . .
    `)
    walking.addAnimationFrame(img`
        . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
        . . 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 . .
    `)
    animation.attachAnimation(mySprite, walking)
    animation.attachAnimation(mySprite, idle)
}
controller.B.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, function () {
    scene.setTileMap(img`
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . . 7 . . . . .
        . 7 . 2 7 . . . . .
        7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7
    `)
    scene.placeOnRandomTile(mySprite, 2)
})
let idle: animation.Animation = null
let walking: animation.Animation = null
let mySprite: Sprite = null
scene.setBackgroundImage(img`
    9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9

mySprite.ay = 500
game.onUpdate(function () {
    if (!(mySprite.isHittingTile(CollisionDirection.Left)) || !(mySprite.isHittingTile(CollisionDirection.Right))) {
        if (Math.abs(mySprite.vx) > 0) {
            animation.setAction(mySprite, ActionKind.Walking)
        } else {
            animation.setAction(mySprite, ActionKind.Idle)
        }
    } else {
        animation.setAction(mySprite, ActionKind.Idle)
    }
})
// CONTROL BLOCK
game.onUpdate(function () {
    if (controller.left.isPressed() && !(controller.right.isPressed())) {
        mySprite.ax = -300
    } else if (controller.right.isPressed() && !(controller.left.isPressed())) {
        mySprite.ax = 300
    } else {
        mySprite.ax = 0
    }
})
```
